div.p: Well when I was really young I didn’t really know what I wanted to be but from senior school I wanted to be a dancer
and I wanted to go down the performing arts route and that’s what I did when I left school but I did my Performing Arts Diploma
got into Uni, deferred it for a year, got a job as an administrator, started earning money and I didn’t want to go to Uni after that.
I bought a car, had a long-term boyfriend, moved out and then 4 years later I thought oh no, what have I done? I slightly regretted
not going down the Uni route but then I started retraining to be a beauty therapist
